meanings.sent1: The pistillate flowers in the garden are beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The pistillate plants are essential for fruit production.
meanings.sent3: The pistillate flowers decided to have a pistil-only party.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a pistillate garden, full of potential but lacking some elements.
meanings.sent5: The pistillate characteristics of the plant make it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: A flower or plant with pistils but no stamens.
meanings.sent1: I planted a pistillate in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The pistillate stood out among the other flowers.
meanings.sent3: The pistillate plant was the star of the garden show.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was like a pistillate in a field of stamens.
meanings.sent5: The pistillate's beauty captivated all who passed by.
